ISSUE.TITLE: Wrong State Code
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Romania Department Code for Bucuresti is wrong in table llx_c_departements (rowid 1182). According to ISO_3166-2:RO (which is used by Romanian gov), the correct code should be "B" instead of "BU" now. The rest of the code are correct. ### Dolibarr Version 13.0.2 and 18.0.4 ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_
